EmailTemplate.name: SGT-WA037_October16-17_2012.ConfirmationReminder
EmailTemplate.subject: SEE YOU NEXT WEEK: Billing Software Group Training in Wenatchee WA, on October 16-17, 2012
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
STAY CONNECTED <http://www.facebook.com/pages/Tritech-Software-Systems/89416081839> <http://twitter.com/tritechsoftware> <http://www.linkedin.com/companies/tritech-software-systems> <http://www.youtube.com/user/TriTechSoftware> We're Looking Forward to Seeing You Next Week REMINDER: Billing Software Group Training in Wenatchee WA, Next Week Hello {{lead.First Name:default=Billing Customer}},
We're looking forward to seeing you next week for our Billing Software Group Training. If you have questions or if there is anything we can do to make this a better experience for you, please contact us at:
CONTACT FOR MORE INFORMATION:
Wayne Walker, LifeLine Ambulance wwalker@eaglegroup.com | 509-422-6977
Brenda Taylor, TriTech Software Systems Brenda.Taylor@tritech.com | 800-537-3927 ext 6233
Here is a link to download a sample copy of the agenda, if you'd like: Training Agenda <http://www.tritechems.com/documents/_UG/Sample_2-day_Group_Training_agenda.pdf>.
Registration will begin on the first day at 7:45 a.m. We sincerely hope that these two days of education will allow everyone to gain knowledge in the areas desired. Although this is classroom-style training, feel free to bring a laptop if you have access to one and you will be able to participate in some “hands-on” activities.
We invite you to dress casually and comfortably for the session. Since room temperatures and preferences vary from person to person, please bring a sweater or sweatshirt to wear if needed.
See you next week!
________________________________________
Billing Software Group Training in Wenatchee WA on October 16-17, 2012
TRAINING LOCATION: 501 North Wenatchee Ave. East Wenatchee WA 98801 <https://maps.google.com/maps?oe=utf-8&client=firefox-a&q=501+North+Wenatchee+Ave.+Wenatchee+WA+98801&ie=UTF-8&hq=&hnear=0x549bcc974f3cbfad:0x7bc5d0509cada363,501+N+Wenatchee+Ave,+Wenatchee,+WA+98801&gl=us&ei=wcnQT5KWF-Hb0QHvqOTCDQ&oi=geocode_result&ved=0CAoQ8gEwAA>
RECOMMENDED HOTEL: Cedars Inn 80 Ninth Street NE|East Wenatchee WA, 98802 Website: http://eastwenatcheecedarsinn.com Telephone: 509-886-8000
